text:
In Apache Web Server, it is possible to require strong SSL encryption. i.e. you 
can make it so that a client has to connect using 128-bit encryption. I'm 
hoping that the Tomcat Web Server can be enhanced so that one can enter a 
setting into the configuration file similar to how Apache Web Server works in 
order to do this.
creator: jemiller@uchicago.edu
pier@betaversion.org
text:
This is not a bug... Please read the documentation coming with Tomcat 
4.0.
